entities: Economic Community of West African States
summary:
8. Urges the Government to continue dialogue with stakeholders on peacebuilding and development goals.

9. Calls on the Government to enhance the effectiveness of the Transnational Organized Crime Unit.

10. Encourages the Government to implement the National Gender Strategic Plan and address Gender-Based Violence.

11. Requests UNIPSIL to continue providing integrated support to Sierra Leone.

12. Requests UNIPSIL to engage constructively with the Sierra Leone national authorities.

13. Encourages the Peacebuilding Commission to continue providing support to Sierra Leone.
The Security Council:

 Requests UNIPSIL, in collaboration with the UN country team, the Government of Sierra Leone, and bilateral and international partners, to continue preparations for the transition of UNIPSIL.

 Requests the Secretary-General to deploy an inter-agency technical assessment mission to Sierra Leone to review progress made in implementing UNIPSIL's mandate.

 Requests the Secretary-General to provide a report, by no later than 15 February 2013, containing detailed proposals and a recommended timeline for the transition, drawdown, and exit strategy of UNIPSIL.

 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
